author: hwright
msg: Add a flag to configure to enable the Ev2 shims.  This is labeled as
experimental, and should be removed when Ev2 is eventually released.  Since
this won't happen in 1.8, and some of the items to support the shims might
impact performance, this allows us to enable / disable them throughout the
